Image::CleanupDrawingObtainer

 CleanupDrawingObtainer (const Image &image)

Detailed Description

Allocated on a stack in the method Draw the CleanupDrawingObtainer assures a consistent state of the image-properties when interrupting the drawing-process by a return-statement.
